message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Your turn to be reasonable. This is a bit more fair considering the inflation.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more.
This is as close to even as it's going to get. Take it before the money shrinks again.
I'll meet you closer to the middle, but I'm not going below 57%.
Time is running out! This is my final offer. Let's end this before we both lose.
I'm not backing down. You should consider the cost of walking away with nothing.
